original_text: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.
korean_text: 영원하신 하나님이 네 처소가 되시니 그의 영원하신 팔이 네 아래에 있도다 그가 네 앞에서 대적을 쫓으시며 멸하라 하시도다

sentences.original_text: The eternal God is thy refuge
and underneath are the everlasting arms
and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee
